long_description: Filled with Marmot's own mid-loft polyester insulation, the men's Calen Jacket offers an excellent warmth-to-weight ratio for mountaineering and other backcountry adventures. Nylon ripstop shell is quilted with Thermal R polyester insulation. Angel-Wing Movement(TM) frees up your arm mobility. Elastic-bound cuffs and an adjustable hem on the Marmot Calen Jacket seal in warmth. Brushed DriClime(R) collar lining adds comfort. Zippered handwarmer pockets and chest pocket; inside zippered pocket.
short_description: Filled with Marmot's own mid-loft polyester insulation, the men's Calen Jacket offers an excellent warmth-to-weight ratio for mountaineering and other backcountry adventures.
